text: I was sitting in that sitting room right
outside the chapel which I will never
forget because I was sitting on the
couch and I I think I felt complete and
total despairs the only way to say how I
felt and so this nun walked by and she
turned and looked at me and said is
there anything I can do for you and I
realized that no one could help me that
I did just no one could help me so I
said to her I said no thank you
and she left and so I got up and I went
into the chapel and I was just kneeling
there and I have no idea I doubt
seriously I was saying anything I think
I was just looking at the cross above
the altar and then out of the blue out
of the absolute blue suddenly everything
went gold and the crucifix started
shimmering and the room was shimmering
and I had this unbelievable experience
of God loving me and I jumped up and ran
out and ran to my room and I was
standing in my room and I said I think
out loud I said I love myself in the
minute the very minute the word myself
came out of my mouth I knew I had been
completely transformed because up until
that point I would have never said that
I would have said I love you because I I
had no sense of myself I thought of
myself as you and the minute the word
myself came from my mouth I knew and
I've always known ever since that I
would never ever cross that line again
to being crazy
you
